### [Constants](/documentation/Accelerate/quadrature_status/init(_:)#Constants)

[`init(rawValue: Int32)`](/documentation/accelerate/quadrature_status/init(rawvalue:))[`var rawValue: Int32`](/documentation/accelerate/quadrature_status/rawvalue)[`var QUADRATURE_ALLOC_ERROR: quadrature_status`](/documentation/accelerate/quadrature_alloc_error)A constant that indicates that memory allocation failed.[`var QUADRATURE_ERROR: quadrature_status`](/documentation/accelerate/quadrature_error)A constant that indicates that a generic error occurred.[`var QUADRATURE_INTEGRATE_BAD_BEHAVIOUR_ERROR: quadrature_status`](/documentation/accelerate/quadrature_integrate_bad_behaviour_error)A constant that indicates bad integrand behaviour, or that an excessive roundoff error occurred.[`var QUADRATURE_INTEGRATE_MAX_EVAL_ERROR: quadrature_status`](/documentation/accelerate/quadrature_integrate_max_eval_error)A constant that indicates that the requested accuracy limit could not be reached.[`var QUADRATURE_INTERNAL_ERROR: quadrature_status`](/documentation/accelerate/quadrature_internal_error)A constant that indicates that an internal error occurred.[`var QUADRATURE_INVALID_ARG_ERROR: quadrature_status`](/documentation/accelerate/quadrature_invalid_arg_error)A constant that indicates that an invalid argument was passed to the operation.[`var QUADRATURE_SUCCESS: quadrature_status`](/documentation/accelerate/quadrature_success)A constant that indicates that the Quadrature operation was successful.
